quizDescription: Enjoy some lighthearted trivia with this fun quiz.

questions.question: What is the name of the fictional wizarding school in the Harry Potter series?
questions.explanation: The fictional wizarding school in the Harry Potter series is called 'Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.'

questions.question: In which city did the famous 'Woodstock' music festival take place in 1969?
questions.explanation: The famous 'Woodstock' music festival took place in Bethel, New York, in 1969.

questions.question: What is the highest-grossing animated film of all time (as of my knowledge cutoff date in September 2021)?
questions.explanation: As of September 2021, 'The Lion King' was the highest-grossing animated film of all time.

questions.question: Which planet in our solar system is known as the 'Red Planet'?
questions.explanation: Mars is often referred to as the 'Red Planet' due to its reddish appearance.

questions.question: What is the famous shipwreck that sank on its maiden voyage in 1912?
questions.explanation: The famous shipwreck that sank on its maiden voyage in 1912 was 'The Titanic.'
